item.description:
Itâ€™s Partying with Style!!

This December 5, 2009, the beautiful Whitney Ballroom in Boston will be home to Masacote's Black and White Salsa Ball, an exhilarating evening of salsa shows,dinner, live music, networking, photo ops, and dancing. Bring your most elegant dress and pick out your best tux to Boston's First Black Tie Salsa Affair.

Become infused with the intoxicating energy that has made salsa a worldwide craze by world renowned music and dance artists invited directly to Boston. Get ready to experience an Unforgettable Night of Networking, Mingling, and Festivities...
 Salsa Shows by International and National Artists
 A Specialty 3 Course Dinner
 Live Concert by Critically Acclaimed Ritmo Masacote
 Salsa Dancing to the Live Band, DJ Rob Suave, and Guest DJ Renzo from DC
 Door Prizes Raffled throughout evening! (must be present to win)
 Professional Photography Services & Red Carpet Photos
 Special Photo Ops Available for Purchase during the night!

Fees: $39.00 in Advance
$49.00 at the door
*Includes Chair seating during the event.

Please Note: You must purchase tickets though the Meet-Up Group to stay with the group during the night.


Full tables available
Table of 4: $200 without diner, or $336 with dinner
Table of 6: $300 without diner, or $504 with dinner
Table of 8: $400 without diner, or $672 with dinner
*To purchase tables please contact Kevin Ball @ kball11@gmail.com (617-529-2199)

If you have any questions, please contact
Angel Santiago at: Santiago6one7@yahoo.com
AIM: Alos00rican



***ALL PROCEEDS TO BENEFIT "OUR PLACE" FOR HOMELESS CHILDREN***

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Masacote's Black and White Salsa Ball
